channel.title: Make it go away
channel.description: help this guy i ipban him, and he comes back in seconds ive ip'd him over 200 million times and when i do he gets mad and practicly crashes the server make it go away... please!

item.title: Make it go away
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“koopa king, post:4, topic:276044”]Well, if the person is using Syi, they are leaving a nulled IP. If they have a previous account on your server and you know who it is, copy and paste their IP from the character file they were on into your bannedip’s log.[/quote]we4ll ive done that its kinda common sense, but he just comes back ive ipd him 200 differnt times its always a differnt ip and

[quote=“CAPT_AMERIKA, post:5, topic:276044”]try this:

get his IP, and try placing a IP range ban.

so for the IP 200.200.200.200, you could ban all ranges by putting this:

200.200..

in your bannedip’s file. hope this works[/quote]how would i do this? ill rep you if this works o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Make it go away
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

try this:

get his IP, and try placing a IP range ban.

so for the IP 200.200.200.200, you could ban all ranges by putting this:

200.200..

in your bannedip’s file. hope this works

Read full topic

item.title: Make it go away
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Well, if the person is using Syi, they are leaving a nulled IP. If they have a previous account on your server and you know who it is, copy and paste their IP from the character file they were on into your bannedip’s log.

Read full topic
